measured_by: five items from the Dutch "Quick scan digital skills" measurement tool
justification: "Digital literacy … was assessed using five items from the Dutch 'Quick scan digital skills' measurement tool… to identify patients' digital literacy in general practice."
"To assess health literacy, six items from the HSL-EU-Q47 were selected that cover all cognitive domains deemed necessary to handle health information within the health care setting."

measured_by: 16-item scale developed according to PsyCoRe repository instructions
justification: "Beliefs about the effects of online access ('beliefs') were assessed… using 16 items… operationalized by following instructions on measuring instrumental attitude belief expectations from the PsyCoRe repository."
construct: beliefs about effects of online access / instrumental attitude belief expectations
